title: Election Notice in 大漢公報 (Chinese Times Newspaper) and A Copywriting of Election Notice on December 24, 1926
title (chinese): 選舉佈告及十二月廿四日佈告
description: A notice advertised in 大漢公報/ Chinese Times Newspaper announced that the fourth staff election would be held from December 24 to 31, 1927. The primary election would be held on January 23, 1927. Members of the Wong clan who held shares in the Wong Kung Har Tong Company Limited were encouraged to participate in the election.
creator: Cheuk Kit (Philip) Chung
subject: 加拿大黃江夏堂實業有限公司/ Wong Kung Har Tong Company Limited; 大漢公報/ Chinese Times Newspaper;

title: Official Letter: Dates and Procedures for the Fourth Staff Election
title (chinese): 第四次職員選舉章程、方式及重要日期
description: An official letter from President 黃洽昌 and Secretary 黃儉傳 announced that the Wong Kung Har Tong Company Limited conducted its fourth staff election according to established rules. The company issued ballots for the primary election and encouraged Wong clan members to vote on January 23, 1927. Ballots were to be returned to the company by January 31, 1927, with vote counting scheduled for February 1, 1927. The secondary election for the primary elected candidates would be scheduled for February 6, 1927.
creator: Cheuk Kit (Philip) Chung
subject: 加拿大黃江夏堂實業有限公司/ Wong Kung Har Tong Company Limited; 黃洽昌; 黃儉傳

title: Financial Report and Shareholder Notice from 加拿大黃江夏堂實業有限公司/ Wong Kung Har Tong Company Limited on December 31, 1926
title (chinese): 加拿大黃江夏堂實業有限公司財務報告與股東通告
description: A financial report and shareholder notice issued by Wong Kung Har Tong Company Limited on December 31, 1926. It outlines the company's investment in a building project, including capital allocation, tax payments, and expected returns. The letter acknowledges financial challenges and delays in profit distribution, reassuring shareholders of the company's ongoing efforts to stabilize operations.
creator: Cheuk Kit (Philip) Chung
right: No title appears in or on the item, we decide to write a brief descriptive title
subject: 加拿大黃江夏堂實業有限公司/ Wong Kung Har Tong Company Limited

title: Election Ballot for the Board of Directors and Officers of 加拿大黃江夏堂實業有限公司/ Wong Kung Har Tong Company Limited on January 23, 1927
title (chinese): 中華民國十六年元月二十三日加拿大黄江夏堂實業有限公司選舉票
description: An election ballot for the board of directors and officers of 加拿大黃江夏堂實業有限公司/ Wong Kung Har Tong Company Limited, issued on January 23, 1927 in Canada. It lists the candidates nominated for board positions, along with voting instructions for shareholders. The document outlines voting regulations, including the number of candidates a shareholder can vote for. It reflects the governance structure and decision-making processes within the company.
creator: Cheuk Kit (Philip) Chung
subject: 加拿大黃江夏堂實業有限公司/ Wong Kung Har Tong Company Limited
